definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.chinese: 艾丽森的父亲汉克也是混血儿。
但第二代混血儿就不同了。

sentences.english: "These Amerasians are pretty amazing, " Nancy said.
sentences.chinese: 这些美亚混血儿太不可思议了。

sentences.english: It is very significant to study on the text of Halfbreed.
sentences.chinese: 对《混血儿》的文本解读和研究是十分有意义的。

sentences.english: Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.chinese: 人类和女妖的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法。

sentences.english: The hybrid child of a murderous utopia and a disenchanted époque.
sentences.chinese: 血腥凶残的乌托邦和幻灭的时代产下了混血儿。
他还记得自己辱骂美亚混血儿的事情。

sentences.english: Shamans ? Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.chinese: 人类和魅魔的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法。

sentences.english: I told her I was tall, broad and mixed race.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉她，我长的又高又壮，还是个混血儿。

sentences.english: A childless couple adopted the half-breed.
sentences.chinese: 一对无子女的夫妇领养了这个混血儿。

sentences.english: The younger half-breed had proven that he was more than capable of protecting himself.
sentences.chinese: 而这稚嫩的混血儿已经证明了他能够保护他自己。

sentences.english: For Amerasians the journey to a new life would be much tougher.
sentences.chinese: 对美亚混血儿来说，前往新生活的旅程要艰难得多。

sentences.english: I'm a half, yeah. I'm half Japanese and half Irish.
sentences.chinese: 我是日本和爱尔兰的混血儿。

sentences.english: Lessons on race for my biracial son.
sentences.chinese: 给我的混血儿子讲的关于人种的教导。

sentences.english: This is the Rainbow Choir. Nearly every child is biracial;
sentences.chinese: 这是彩虹合唱团，几乎所有的孩子都是混血儿。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
